reviewTitle: Christmas Eve dinner after the panto
review_details: Had an amazing meal here last night after another very enjoyable panto at the spa, food was excellent, all the family were very impressed, it is just what Bridlington needs , food was very high quality and all perfectly cooked , we will definitely be back , thanks very much
Beautiful Greek food in a lovely garden setting, the mezze starter tray, was fab, beautiful lamb , but all food was delicious, staff were very attentive, had a lovely evening

Nefis travel organised 4 private trips for us , the sunset tour ( olive oil factory, winery and a lovely dinner) a private speedboat to shipwreck beach and again to turtle beach and a trip with Zante fishing tours, Mariska was very helpful, I would highly recommend we had a brilliant holiday, thank you

Had an amazing day fishing ( 27/8/19) with George and his crew , the boat can take 12 passengers but we decided to hire it privately as we were a party of 7 . We all had a go at putting the nets out about 1500 metres , then over to a private island for a swim to shore , drinks in Porta Roma which is beautiful. Kids had a go on a speedboat inflatable ride which they loved! Then lunch on board the boat which was delicious, best day of our holiday, only Georgios has the licence to do this type of trip , was brilliant day! Thanks Georgios

We have been staying at the palm court for many many years now and always find it excellent. The staff are very friendly and attentive, the food just gets better every year. Always nice to see David behind the bar, overall a great hotel

Visited last night , weâ€™ve been on a few occasions now and was excellent as always a really warm and friendly place to eat and drink. Starters were very tasty, scotch egg nice and runny in the middle. My 12 year old likes his steak medium rare and so many places over cook it , particularly for a child requesting this but last night was cooked to perfection. Apple tart and the brownie were polished off as well. All in all very good indeed.
